description: This is a procurement for the purchase, delivery of office furniture to Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada by February 16, 2024.
full_summary:
**Procurement Notice**
------------------------

### Solicitation Title
**Freestanding Height Adjustable Desks**

### Tender Number
5K001-230834

### Tender Period
The solicitation period started on August 30, 2023, and ended on September 19, 2023 at 3:00 PM Central Time.

### Contract Details
The contract is for the supply and delivery of 1 freestanding height adjustable desk to the Canadian Grain Commission in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada. The expected delivery date is on or before February 16, 2024.

### Procurement Strategy
This tender is set aside for Indigenous Businesses (PSIB) under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses (PSIB) initiative.

### Product Category
The product category for this tender is Category 2 - Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products under Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/B.

### Contact Information
The contact person for this tender is Sheila Kvern, who can be reached at sheila.kvern@grainscanada.gc.ca or (204) 983-8302.

### Tender Documents
The tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders).

### Tender Description
The procurement is for a single freestanding height adjustable desk, with the features and specifications detailed in the tender documents. The supplier must meet the requirements outlined in the tender documents and provide evidence of their qualification to be eligible for the contract.

### Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Attachment
Please find the tender documents and attachments at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8626/rfb_en-cat.2.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8626/rfb_en-cat.2.pdf). Please note that the tender documents are in English. Please consult the document for French language requirements. 

Note: I have made sure that all the relevant details are included and no important information was excluded.  I have also rewritten the entry in a more professional manner. 
Let me know if you need any further assistance.  If you want me to change anything, don't hesitate to ask.  Next step?  Do you need any further modifications before I prepare the final
